_description: In praise of women — lines 344-50 of Hoccleve’s Lespistre de Cupide (1092), occurring separately

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
Womans herte vnto no creweltyeenclynys ys but they be
                    charytable…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…what women these haue not parauenturefolowyth not the way off
                    her nature
